articles.title: Youth of Songun Korea Will Display Heroic Spirit in Confrontation with U.S.: Youth League Spokesman
articles.content:
Youth of Songun Korea Will Display Heroic Spirit in Confrontation with U.S.: Youth League Spokesman
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made a final decision for all-out action against the U.S. and advanced a new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear armed force at the March Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. In this regard a spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League made public a statement Thursday. 
					 Millions of Korean youth turned out as one in the sacred war for annihilating the enemy, true to the important decision made by the great man of Mt. Paektu, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The youth vanguard, grown under the care of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, is ready to flatten even a mountain once the headquarters of the revolution issues an order. This is their spirit and proud tradition.
					
					 The Korean youth will sweep away those who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK to the last man, fluttering the flag of the supreme commander, banner of victory and glory, and holding tight the arms for devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 They are waiting for the final order of the Supreme Command.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces had better know that there are millions of the youth vanguard, human bullets and bombs replete with the spirit of annihilating the enemy, united close around the headquarters of the revolution in Songun Korea.
					
					 When they ignite a nuclear war at any cost, the Korean youth, shock brigade of the Supreme Commander, will clearly show the world what the real arms and war are like.
					
					 Those who provoke the just cause of the DPRK will meet only death.
					
					 The statement called on the south Korean young people, transparent in the sense of justice and ardent in patriotism, to vigorously turn out in the nationwide resistance against the anti-DPRK aggression moves of the U.S. and the puppet group of traitors that are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the whole of Korea.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Flies Back
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies headed by N. Dorjsuren flew back Friday.

articles.title: Indian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Indian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Indian Foreign Ministry headed by Joint Secretary for East Asia Department Gautam Hemant Bambawale visited Mangyongdae on Friday.
					 The members of the delegation visited the old home in Mangyongdae where President Kim Il Sung was born and cultivated great intention of revolution in his childhood. Being briefed on the touching story about the old home, they went round historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph and other places.

articles.title: More Army-People Meetings Held in DPRK
articles.content:
More Army-People Meetings Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- There are taking place in cities (districts) and counties of the DPRK army-people meetings to support the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, and vow to win a victory in the final life-and-death battle with such aggressors as the U.S. imperialists and their south Korean puppet traitors.
					 The areas included Songrim and Tanchon cities, Hungdok District, Yonan, Samjiyon, Kilju, Sijung and Musan counties.
					
					 Present at the meetings were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations as well as servicepersons. Officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms, teachers and students of universities and colleges also attended.
					
					 The speakers said that the important decision made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at an operation meeting on the performance of duty of the Strategic Rocket Force of the Korean People's Army on firepower strike is a declaration of the will to fight a decisive battle and a final decision of justice to provide a turn in putting an end to the history of the confrontation with the U.S. and usher in a new era.
					
					 They recalled that despite repeated warnings of the DPRK, the U.S. imperialists are getting reckless to turn south Korea and the waters off it into the places of exhibiting lethal weapons in which all sorts of nuclear strike weapons were massed aimed to provoke the extremely dangerous nuclear war.
					
					 They noted that the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army would take military counter-measures for an actual war in succession to cope with the prevailing serious situation, and if the aggressors dare provoke, it would blow up the strongholds of aggression by dealing a merciless blow of annihilation to them.
					
					 They called for being loyal to Kim Jong Un's idea and leadership so as to make a positive contribution to putting a final end to the confrontation with U.S.-led imperialism and bringing about a new surge in building an economic power.
					
					 At the end of the meetings, the participants marched along streets.

articles.title: Chongmyong, Traditional Holiday of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Chongmyong, Traditional Holiday of Korean Nation
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Chongmyong is one of the 24 seasonal divisions in a year. It falls on April 5 or 6 every year.
					 It is a traditional custom for Korean families and relatives to have a get-together on the day to tend or remove ancestral graves.
					
					 Kong Myong Song, director of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 On the day, Koreans have used to pay tribute to the memory of their ancestors.
					
					 At graves, they look back upon the life of their own ancestors while taking dishes prepared for the memorial service.
					
					 The day marks the beginning of a yearly farming, with the start of sowing of various crops.
					
					 It was also one of traditional customs to sow seeds of flowering plants in courtyards of houses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Pays Deep Attention to Preserving Traditional Manners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Pays Deep Attention to Preserving Traditional Manners
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Today marks Chongmyong, one of the 24 seasonal divisions in a year. 
					 It is one of the Koreans' manners to visit ancestral graves to pay tribute to the memory of their ancestors on the day.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had paid deep attention to carrying forward the traditional manners among the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 One day in October Juche 95 (2006), Kim Jong Il told officials that from olden times Koreans visit their own ancestral graves to dress them with turf on the day of Chongmyong and trim the grasses grown on graves on the day of Chusok (Harvest Moon Day), noting they prepare various kinds of special dishes, including cakes cooked with newly-harvested grains, for memorial services on those days. And he stressed the need to still encourage such traditional manners.
					
					 On January 1, 1986, he underlined the importance to inherit and develop the national character, saying that it is a traditional custom and national sentiment of the Koreans to dress a bride in Korean chima (skirt) and jogori (coat) in marriage ceremony.
					
					 On February 16, 2003 he said that the younger generation should be taught how to cook traditional dishes.
					
					 He also took a measure to serve roast chestnuts and roast sweet potatoes for the passers-by in streets.
					
					 He made local people get a correct understanding of the history of the Lunar New Year Day and encouraged them to maintain traditional manners and customs on all folklore holidays.

articles.title: Magazine Thongil Published
articles.content:
Magazine Thongil Published
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans published the March issue of Thongil, its monthly socio-political magazine.
					 The magazine gave a detailed account of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's inspection of units of the Korean People's Army illustrated with a photo of him inspecting the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, the forefront outpost in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front close to Paekryong Island and photos of him guiding a live shell firing drill to examine the real war fighting capabilities of artillery sub-units in the hotspots whose mission is to strike Taeyonphyong and Paekryong Islands.
					
					 It elaborated on "On greeting the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as a great festival of victors", the decision adopted at the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It also carried official documents clarifying the principled stand of the DPRK, including a statement issued by the spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command titled "Final victory is in store for our army and people who turned out in defending the sovereignty", a statement by the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea titled "We will never miss the golden opportunity for great war for national reunification" and "Appeal to All Koreans" of the C.C., the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea titled "Let all Koreans in the north, south and abroad turn out as one in the patriotic sacred war of justice for reunification and resolutely shatter the war moves of provocateurs" to cope with the acute situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It carried reports made by major news agencies and radios of Russia over the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 The magazine also introduced world news.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up Economic Construction under WPK's New Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stepping up Economic Construction under WPK's New Line
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The line set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear armed force is a signpost of victory and advance for building at an early date the most powerful country, the people's paradise on this land, in the spirit of resolute offensive, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial.
					 Giving spurs to economic construction is a worthwhile struggle to bring earlier the final victory of building a thriving nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Korea, once subject to distress as a weak colony in the past, is now displaying the dignity as an invincible political and military power, a full-fledged space power and a nuclear weapons state recognized by the world.
					
					 Only when we bring about great innovation and leaping progress in the economic construction and in improving the living standard of the people with the same stamina as displayed in conquering space and succeeding in the nuclear test of high level, will it be possible for the DPRK to flutter the red flag on the eminence of a thriving socialist country.
					
					 We have favorable conditions for channeling funds and manpower into building economy and improving the standard of people's living on the basis of the powerful war deterrence.
					
					 The tremendous mental and material potentials provided by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the socialist system of Juche based on collectivism and rich experience made in the effort to build an economic power are precious assets for making a great leaping progress in economic construction.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all officials, party members and other people to turn out as one in the struggle to make great innovations and leaping progress in the economic construction in the spirit of the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the WPK Central Committee which hardened the conviction of the people in the final victory.

articles.title: WPK's New Line Guarantees Peace in Asia-Pacific Region, Prosperity of Korean Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
WPK's New Line Guarantees Peace in Asia-Pacific Region, Prosperity of Korean Nation: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea's line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force is the most just revolutionary line which guarantees the peace in the Asia-Pacific region and prosperity of the Korean nation, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group of traitors are making desperate efforts, predicting that if the DPRK achieves economic prosperity backed by nuclear weapons, that will mean their failure of hostile policy toward the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. moves have stemmed from its uneasiness that it cannot put the Asia-Pacific region under its control and, furthermore, not hold hegemony over the world unless it stifles the DPRK.
					
					 This hard reality urgently requires the DPRK to simultaneously push forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The tragic incidents in different countries in recent years go to clearly prove that the DPRK's option is very just.
					
					 Some countries in Balkans and Middle East fell victims to interference and invasion by the U.S. and other Western forces. This is because they were not transparent in the stand of self-defence and neglected the building of defence capabilities. This shows that if one does not have strong muscle, one can neither defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation nor achieve happiness and prosperity of the people.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK fully support and approve the WPK's new line and will implement it to the end under any circumstances.

articles.title: Provocateurs Can Not Escape Ultimate Doom: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Provocateurs Can Not Escape Ultimate Doom: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The March 30 special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK declared the firm stance that the north-south relations would be put at the state of war and all the issues arousing between the north and the south be dealt with according to the wartime regulations.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article says this on Friday.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 This reflects the will of the Korean People's Army and the people of the country to fight a decisive battle to put a final end to the long-standing history of confrontation with the U.S., and to win a final victory in the great war for national reunification.
					
					 As the state of war was declared, all agreements which had so far guaranteed the armistice and non-aggression on the Korean Peninsula have been completely scrapped in practice.
					
					 In case there is a slight sign of provocation, the offensive weapons mounted with nuclear warheads as well as long-range artillery pieces will immediately deal physical counter-strikes at the provocative bases without any notice.
					
					 It is by no means threat and demonstration of armed forces.
					
					 The DPRK will mount preemptive nuclear strikes, merciless and thoroughgoing, to any place whether it is the Military Demarcation Line, the five islands in the West Sea of Korea and the U.S. mainland, once the sign of provocation is observed, so that the provocateurs can no longer pursue any daydream.
					
					 The strike of the DPRK will not be confined to a local war, but will be a signal flare marking the start of a holy war for national reunification.
					
					 If a war is unleashed on this land against the will of the Koreans as a result of the consequences entailed by the U.S. and its south Korean puppets' unpardonable actions, the provocateurs can not escape their ultimate doom in the war.

articles.title: U.S. Lambasted for Introducing Nuclear Strategic Attack Means into S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Lambasted for Introducing Nuclear Strategic Attack Means into S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. authorities are describing the recent B-2As drill for striking ground targets on the Korean Peninsula as "part of normal military exercises". They blustered that it "would cancel the plan for opening to media" F-22 deployed in south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is sophism to conceal the attempt at preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and evade the responsibility for creating the touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula and international accusations.
					
					 If the U.S. military bellicose forces have reasons, they cannot dare hurl nuclear strategic attack means into the Korean Peninsula where the Armistice Agreement has become invalid.
					
					 Consequences to be entailed by it are so serious.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is already on the verge of a war.
					
					 The U.S. warlike forces' act of adding fuel to fire in disregard of the situation is a clear proof that they are set to provoke the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers are letting loose a spate of balderdash to cover up their criminal nature as a chieftain harassing peace on the Korean Peninsula but no one will be taken in by it.
					
					 The U.S. should not put up a bold front, counting on its technical superiority.

articles.title: U.S. Slammed for Slandering DPRK's Nukes: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Slammed for Slandering DPRK's Nukes: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- U.S. high-ranking politicians are letting loose a spate of invectives, terming the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons "a violation of the UN Security Council's resolutions" and "threat to global peace and security". They are appeasing the DPRK, blustering that if it gives up nukes, the U.S. will "have dialogue with north Korea and think of providing economic aid".
					 Minju Joson Friday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lurking behind the U.S. outbursts is a vicious aim to distort the nature of the DPRK's nukes in a bid to tarnish its international image, lay an international siege to it and stifle it, the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes is an exercise of the legitimate right to self-defence and so, no one is entitled to slander them.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK over its access to nuclear weapons. This reveals the U.S. extreme disheartened spirit and fit as its hostile policy toward the DPRK does not work on.
					
					 We neither read others' face over the nuclear force nor feel any need to gain others' approval in bolstering it in quality and quantity.
					
					 The DPRK will dynamically advance without hesitation true to the line set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force no matter what others may say and no matter how the situation may change.
					
					 To try to change this strategic line based on the strong faith is a foolish ambition.

articles.title: Aggressors Can Never Be Pardoned: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Aggressors Can Never Be Pardoned: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The decisive battle with the U.S. imperialists and their followers will be a patriotic sacred war of justice based on the truth that the DPRK cannot co-exist with the aggressors keen on bringing it down and daring hurt the supreme dignity, the whole of the life and soul of its army and people.
					 Minju Joson Friday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The nearly 70 year-long moves of the U.S. to antagonize the DPRK are unheard-of ones in their persistency and cruelty, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has persisted in its moves to ignite a war against the DPRK for over 60 years after suffering a bitter defeat in the June 25 Korean war started by it to stifle the DPRK in its cradle.
					
					 The U.S. is pushing forward in the practical phase the moves for unleashing a nuclear war against the DPRK, taking issue with it over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are daring hurt the national treasure of Songun Korea, a crystal of the profound reverence and pure loyalty of all its service personnel and people.
					
					 How we can co-exist with the U.S. and its followers keen on the moves to stifle the DPRK by force of arms while hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership?
					
					 Very just is the judgment and decision of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army that time has gone when words worked on the U.S. and its followers and they should be wiped out only with the arms of Songun.
					
					 That is why all service personnel and people of the DPRK have turned out in the decisive battle to win the final victory in the all-out action against the U.S. in our generation, true to the important decision of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They will give vent to their pent-up grudge and realize cherished desire in the decisive battle of justice to reunify the country and certainly build the most powerful country on this land.

articles.title: U.S. Is Bound to Meet Fate of Tiger Moth: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Bound to Meet Fate of Tiger Moth: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is hurling huge nuclear war hardware into south Korea.
					 It introduced there nuclear submarine Cheyenne, B-52 and B-2A, inciting a war fever against the DPRK. It even let F-22s fly into south Korea on March 31. It sent SBX-1 and destroyers with missile interceptor capacity to the waters off the Korean Peninsula. It was also reported that super-large aircraft carrier and its group will be sent to the waters off the peninsula from the U.S. mainland.
					
					 This is a revelation of its foolish moves to frighten the DPRK through the display of so-called "overwhelming" military might and, at same time, lead the former to a change. The U.S. is irritated at the proud look of the DPRK reacting to its stifling moves with the toughest measures.
					
					 The DPRK's resolute and merciless measure such as the declaration of its decision on nullifying the Armistice Agreement and its practical military action are shaking to the very foundation the hostile policy toward the DPRK by the U.S. styling itself the world's only superpower.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that even U.S. experts in Korean issue said in case the DPRK fights a war against the U.S., the reaction by forces of the U.S. and south Korea will be very poor.
					
					 The U.S. is having hard time making judgment whether to fight a war with the DPRK or not with its economy on the verge of bankruptcy.
					
					 This is the reason that the U.S. is bringing lethal weapons to south Korea in succession in a desperate effort to dampen the DPRK's will. It is a foolish act reminding one of a drowning man catching at a straw.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea and puppet forces seized with fear seem to regard lethal equipment including Stealth weapons as ones that can boost their sinking morale. But we are considering them as tiger moths jumping into the nuclear war of justice.
					
					 In case our powerful nuclear strike means are fired all at once, the destiny of tiger moths will become clear.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks that the DPRK, which has smaller, lighter and diversified latest nuclear strike means, will step back in an all-out action with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will invariably advance straight along the road of Songun, the road of bolstering nuclear armed force unless the U.S. does abandon its ambition for stifling the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Peace against War
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Achieving Peace against War was inaugurated in Seoul, south Korea. It consists of more than 30 organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty.
					 A press conference on the inauguration was held on Wednesday.
					
					 At the conference the organization said the situation on the Korean Peninsula has reached a brink of war after going beyond the danger level due to the U.S. and south Korean regime's racket of "sanctions" and joint military drills against the north.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean "government" and "National Assembly" have failed to make substantial efforts to control the situation and got frantic in confrontation racket, it deplored.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The decades-long "sanctions" and military pressure upon the north have resulted in the on-going nuclear showdown.
					
					 The south Korean people organize the People's Action for Achieving Peace against War which involves people from all walks of life including workers, peasants, youth and students and religious persons in a bid to check a war and achieve peace.
					
					 The organization will stage positive actions including signature campaign and publication of declaration for the peaceful settlement of the issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It underscored the need to conduct activities for building an international public opinion in favor for achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula and in other parts of the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: Anti-War Action Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-War Action Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet radio Voice of People in a commentary on April 4 called upon people from all social standings to rise up in the anti-war action.
					 The commentary referred to the dangerous development in the Kaesong Industrial Zone which is on the verge of shutdown.
					
					 The U.S. is rattling the nerve of the north to the extremes by deploying nuclear strategic bombers, nuclear submarines and other nuclear attack means in the sky and seas of south Korea, escalating the tension, the commentary charged.
					
					 It expressed concern over the Korean Peninsula turning into a dangerous place where an all-out war may break out.
					
					 Defying the unpredictable and acute situation in which a war may break out anytime, the south Korean authorities are concealing the fact and crying out for only countermeasures, not taking steps, the commentary held.
					
					 Peace does not come of itself, the commentary said, calling upon people from all walks of life to rise up in the action to remove the dark clouds of a war hanging over the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Accused of Nuclear War Maneuvers
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Accused of Nuclear War Maneuvers
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- An urgent meeting of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan was held in Tokyo on April 3 to denounce the U.S. and its followers including the south Korean group of traitors keen on the nuclear war maneuvers while hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, made a report.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war is to disarm the DPRK, bring down its social system and obliterate the Korean nation, he said.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is openly revealing its attempt to "strike commanding forces" and dare hurt even the symbol of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with crying out for "preemptive strike" and "powerful punishment" by taking advantage of the U.S. moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK, he noted, condemning it as a treason against humanity.
					
					 He called upon all officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to turn out as one in the struggle to defend the motherland and wage a dynamic patriotic movement of Chongryon to cope with the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers vowed to keep pace with the people in the homeland all out in the do-or-die resistance to absolutely defend the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, safeguard the socialist country more precious than their own lives and rise up in the sacred war for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website on March 26 the detailed gist of the conclusion made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the national meeting of light industrial workers.
					 The work, published on March 18, Juche 102 (2013), indicates the principal tasks to be held fast to in the field of the light industry and clarifies the ways for bringing about a fresh turn in developing the light industry.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Ecuadorian Institution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Ecuadorian Institution
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted on the website of Kim Jong Il Library in Ecuador on March 28.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed during their lifetimes. It also indicates tasks to firmly defend and eternally glorify their idea and exploits.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Cambodia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Cambodia
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee was inaugurated on April 1 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the committee at the instructions of Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events from April 1 to 20 to widely introduce the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cambodia which were provided by the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Events took place to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung in Mexico, Nigeria and Germany between March 26 and 28.
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Il Sung as the sun of the Korean nation and the benevolent father who defeated the U.S. and Japan, two formidable imperialist enemies, in one generation and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist nation independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung will always live in the hearts of the progressive mankind as he made immortal contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, said that the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in ideology and leadership and lofty traits wisely leads the Korean people to the road of independence, the road of Songun.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The enemies cannot bring the DPRK to its knees, which accessed the powerful nuclear deterrent thanks to the far-sighted wisdom of the Generalissimos and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's exploits will shine forever with the bright future of socialist Korea.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Nigeria and Germany.

articles.title: Imperialist Rabid Dog Can Be Tamed Only with Strength: Ukrainian Organizations
articles.content:
Imperialist Rabid Dog Can Be Tamed Only with Strength: Ukrainian Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Soviet Officers Union and the Sovetski Centr in a joint statement on March 28 said that the imperialist rabid dog can be tamed only with strength.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The introduction of nuclear strategic bombers into the drills poses a threat to global peace and security, going beyond the phase of showdown in the region.
					
					 To brandish nukes against the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state, is arousing concern of all countries. The UN is defaulting on its duty before such danger. This proves that independent and sovereign states need to find a new method to protect themselves.
					
					 So we fully support the most resolute and strong step which was laid down in the March 26 statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the DPRK Foreign Ministry to defend the dignity of the country and the gains of socialism.

articles.title: U.S. War Moves Slammed by Russians
articles.content:
U.S. War Moves Slammed by Russians
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Russians denounced the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					 Ivan Sluhai, chairman of the Moscow War Veterans Committee, said on March 27:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities will not unleash a war against the DPRK, a country that has access to the powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK has powerful nuclear and missile strike capabilities to resolutely counter the provocation of hostile forces.
					
					 The committee extends support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and bitterly denounces the U.S. for its nuclear strike drills.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly win a final victory in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Sergey Kramarenko, vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said on the same day:
					
					 The Korean people will not abandon their sovereignty despite the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 The DPRK is holding Kim Jong Un, another brilliant Songun commander, as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The U.S. will get only destruction in igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people will win a victory in the confrontation with the U.S. under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Cuba
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Cuba
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people was held in Havana on March 28.
					 Present there were delegates of political parties and organizations of various countries including Palestine, Colombia, Guatemala, Chile and Puerto Rico, who are residing in Cuba.
					
					 At the meeting the delegate of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine made a report in which he referred to the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the mad-cap war provocation moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, and to the countermeasures the DPRK has taken to cope with the hostile forces' moves for aggression.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The delegate of the Colombian Revolutionary Movement said the U.S. has desperately kicked up the moves of aggression against other countries wherever they set their feet, massacring civilians and making them crippled. He termed the U.S. a country of aggression.
					
					 The delegate of the National Revolutionary Union of Guatemala said:
					
					 The on-going military drills of the U.S. and its allies are war drills targeting the DPRK to all intents and purposes. The U.S. should not underestimate the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, he added.
					
					 The delegate of the Communist Party of Chile urged the UN Security Council to retract its "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and support its measures for self-defence. 
					
					 A letter of solidarity to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: U.S. Should Stop Nuclear War Maneuvers and Behave with Discretion: Vishwanath
articles.content:
U.S. Should Stop Nuclear War Maneuvers and Behave with Discretion: Vishwanath
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council who is also director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, made public a statement on March 27 in support of the statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 He said that the U.S. nuclear war racket has entered the practical phase after going beyond the danger line. He went on:
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know the resentment of the DPRK and its iron will to do what it is determined to do, and stop at once the reckless nuclear war exercises and behave with discretion.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its moves for igniting a nuclear war despite the warnings of the DPRK, it will face self-destruction.
					
					 He, in the name of the Juche idea followers of the world, fully supported the principled stand of the DPRK. He extended firm solidarity to the DPRK's army and people in their just struggle to defend their dignity.
					
					 Victory is in store for the Korean people who turned out in the actions to defend the sovereignty and progressive mankind loving justice and peace, he stressed.

articles.title: Korean People's All-out Action Is Very Just: Organizations of Nigeria, Poland
articles.content:
Korean People's All-out Action Is Very Just: Organizations of Nigeria, Poland
						
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nigeria and Poland on March 28 fully supported the statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 We can hardly repress resentment at the news that the U.S. is prodding south Korean warmongers into making precision strike at the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang and other different places of the DPRK.
					
					 They are hurting the most inviolable dignity of the Korean people, not content with kicking off the nuclear war maneuvers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It is very just that the Korean people declared they would launch an all-out action with the U.S. in order to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation.
					
					 We will always stand on the side of the fraternal Korean people who are determined to protect the dignity of their supreme leadership.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in a statement referred to the fact that the Korean people have always won victories in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 The statement stressed the need to apply sanctions against the U.S. which has violated the sovereignty of the Korean nation and threatened it with nuclear weapons for a long period.

articles.title: Juventud coreana mostrara su impetu heroico en enfrentamiento con EE.UU.: vocero de CC de UJS
articles.content:
Juventud coreana mostrara su impetu heroico en enfrentamiento con EE.UU.: vocero de CC de UJS
						
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo la decision final del enfrentamiento antiyanqui y presento en el pleno de marzo del 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la nueva linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, el vocero del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung hizo publica la vispera una declaracion.
					Millones de jovenes coreanos se movilizaron en la sagrada batalla para exterminar a los enemigos en acato a la decision importante del gran hombre sin igual del monte Paektu, inicia la nota y prosigue:
					
					Los vanguardistas juveniles, crecidos en el regazo de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, tienen el temperamento y tradicion gloriosa de responder con fidelidad a los llamados de la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Agitando la bandera del Comandante Supremo, bandera de victoria y gloria, y tomando mas firmemente los fusiles de defensa a ultranza al lider, los jovenes coreanos aniquilaran a todos los tipejos que traten de manchar y atentar contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los jovenes esperan la orden final de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					El imperio yanqui y la banda titere surcoreana deben darse cuenta de que la Corea del Songun, colmada del animo de exterminar a enemigos, cuenta con millones de vanguardistas juveniles unidos compactamente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Si los enemigos desatan por fin la guerra nuclear, los jovenes coreanos, brigada de choque del Comandante Supremo, demostraran a todo el mundo lo que es la guerra y el fuego de verdad.
					
					Los desafiantes a la justa causa de la RPDC sufriran la muerte.
					
					Al final, la nota exhorto a los patrioticos jovenes surcoreanos amantes de la justicia a levantarse en la resistencia pannacional por frustrar las maquinaciones de agresion anti-RPDC del imperio norteamericano y la banda traidora surcoreana que acarrean el nubarron de guerra nuclear al territorio patrio.

articles.title: Chongmyong, fiesta folclorica de la nacion coreana
articles.content:
Chongmyong, fiesta folclorica de la nacion coreana
						
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Chongmyong es una de las 24 divisiones del ano que cae en el 5 o 6 de abril de cada ano.
					Es una costumbre tradicional para el pueblo coreano visitar este dia las tumbas de sus antepasados con los platos preparados.
					
					Citado por la ACNC, Kong Myong Song (46 anos de edad), director del Instituto de Folclore de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, dijo:
					
					Este dia, los coreanos visitan las tumbas de sus antepasados para repararlas o mudarlas a otro lugar.
					
					Cuando llegan a las tumbas, los visitantes limpian la maleza crecida en el invierno y reparan las partes defectuosas.
					
					Recuerdan las vivencias y los episodios que tuvieron con sus antepasados.
					
					Chongmyong es el dia que anuncia tambien el inicio de la agricultura del ano.
					
					En las costumbres de ese dia se reflejan las cualidades morales del pueblo coreano y su laboriosidad.
